positive_examples: This is an example of god.
We observed god in this context.
A typical case of god would involve these features.
The concept of god applies here.
A supreme divine being worshipped as creator and ruler of the universe.
negative_examples: This is an example of angel, not god.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Angel, or other types of Deity

definition: A supreme being or deity worshipped as the creator and ruler of the universe.
